item.title: Note-taking with Notion and ChatGPT for effective meetings
item.description: As an Engineering Manager, taking notes during meetings can be an essential tool to help you stay organized, stay on track, and ensure that you and your team are aligned and moving towards your goals. Why take notes in your meetings? Here are some specific reasons why taking notes during meetings is important: Record of Decisions and Action Items: By taking notes during meetings, you can capture important decisions, action items, and commitments made by both yourself and your team members.
